page.title: 08INDUSTRIES OF BETHERSDEN(2)
page.content: BETHERSDEN ALSO HAS SEVERAL SMALLER FAMILY FIRMS - TWO VEHICLE REPAIR/ENGINEERING WORKSHOPS,ONE SUPPLYING PETROL.TWO GENERAL BUILDING FIRMS COVER ALL ASPECTS FROM SMALL REPAIR JOBS TO BUILDING HOUSES.IN ADDITION THERE ARE SEVERAL SPECIALIST CRAFTSMEN E.G. ELECTRICIAN,PLUMBER, DECORATOR ETC. SECONDHAND AND NEW BUILDING MATERIALS CAN ALSO BE OBTAINED IN THE VILLAGE.TWO MORE UNUSUAL ENTERPRISES ARE A SPILE MAKER AND A TRAVELLING FARRIER WHO HAS A LOCAL FORGE WHERE MOST OF HIS HORSE SHOES ARE MADE.OTHER ENTERPRISES ARE CARPET/LINO LAYING, HAIRDRESSING, FENCING,ARCHITECTURAL WORK. A SMALL WELL ESTABLISHED NURSERY SPECIALISES IN GROWING FUCHSIAS.
